meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Emlen Smith Madeline Wilson Kevin Shrum Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7493.

td.p: Emlen Smith, a college professor from Lafayette, Indiana
Madeline Wilson, a writer from Akron, Ohio
Kevin Shrum, a retired adjunct professor from Fort Collins, Colorado (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,200)

tr.td: PROFILE PICTURES
THE "ANTI"-CATEGORY
THE HUMAN BODY
CLASSIC TV CHARACTERS
LE RESTAURANT SPLENDIDE
JACKET REQUIRED
